lease_identity_and_parties.description: Clauses that define the identity, scope, and legal binding nature of the lease agreement.
lease_identity_and_parties.importance_to_project: Provides legal context and enforceability assumptions for all SLA terms.

lease_timeline_and_renewal_logic.description: Clauses that define when the lease begins, ends, and how renewals or extensions are handled.
lease_timeline_and_renewal_logic.importance_to_project: Critical for identifying hidden auto-renewal risks and lock-in conditions.

payment_structure_and_commitments.description: Clauses impacting direct monetary obligations and indirect financial exposure.
payment_structure_and_commitments.importance_to_project: Used to compute affordability metrics and long-term financial exposure.

termination_and_exit_flexibility.description: Clauses governing termination rights, penalties, and exit constraints.
termination_and_exit_flexibility.importance_to_project: Core driver of fairness score and risk assessment.

warranty_maintenance_and_insurance.description: Clauses defining asset protection, coverage duration, and responsibility allocation.
warranty_maintenance_and_insurance.importance_to_project: Determines operational risk and hidden cost exposure.

usage_and_behavioral_constraints.description: Clauses imposing behavioral, competitive, or post-contractual restrictions.
usage_and_behavioral_constraints.importance_to_project: Identifies non-financial constraints affecting lessee freedom.

legal_enforcement_and_liability.description: Clauses defining legal enforcement power and dispute exposure.
legal_enforcement_and_liability.importance_to_project: Used to assess asymmetric legal power between parties.
